citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the Program of Veterinary Care, record of animals on hand, and records of acquisition and
disposition were not available for review by the inspector. The review of records required by the Animal Welfare Act
facilitates the inspection process by allowing the inspector to determine compliance and evaluate animal welfare. The
facility shall ensure that the records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations are available for USDA APHIS
officials to examine. Correction date: May 23, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of inspection, the Program of Veterinary Care, record of animals on hand, and records of acquisition and 
disposition were not available for review by the inspector. The review of records required by the Animal Welfare Act 
facilitates the inspection process by allowing the inspector to determine compliance and evaluate animal welfare. The 
facility shall ensure that the records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations are available for USDA APHIS 
officials to examine. Correction date: May 23, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
